rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with large windows for natural light, positioned in the north-eastern sector per Vastu, ensuring positive energy flow and privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with sufficient natural light and ventilation, designed with eco-friendly insulation materials.
eco_features: rainwater harvesting system integrated in adjacent outdoor space

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A dedicated study area with ample shelving and space for books, providing a serene environment for reading and work. The room is designed with soundproofing to ensure tranquility.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: The open-plan living area, featuring a blend of modern and eco-friendly design, with large windows for daylighting. It integrates sustainable flooring materials like bamboo.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An eco-friendly kitchen with energy-saving appliances, designed for ease of use. The layout ensures a smooth workflow and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining space that integrates seamlessly with the kitchen and living area, crafted to foster social interaction while remaining energy efficient.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with water-saving fixtures and proper ventilation, designed to enhance privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small utility space for storage and appliances, ensuring efficient use of space with sustainable materials.
